Drake FYS 2019 Lab Guides

The Monastery

Centered in the Southern section of the island, a zen monastery offers puzzling environmental mysteries.

You Are Here

Consider these aspects of the factory environment:

Key Insights

Distant Puzzle Manipulation Obstructions

Audio Logs

  • Ibn ‘Arabi:

Distant Puzzle Manipulation

Consider the first puzzle in this area, locked behind the entrance.

How might we solve this puzzle when it’s trapped behind an impenetrable gate? Does the player need to be directly in front of a puzzle to interact with it?

Obstructions

Centered in the front section of the monastery’s interior, a well-tended Bonsai tree grows serenely.

What simple lesson this puzzle attempt to communicate to the player?

Ibn 'Arabi

After manipulating the East-facing wall of the monastery, an audio log will be revealed sitting within the cut-outs of one of the folding doors.

"Acts of perception attach themselves only to veils, which leave traces in the owner of the eye that perceives them."
---
Ibn 'Arabi

How might a change in your perception reveal pre-existing problems in the environment? Does your perception of the environment generate problems to be solved?

Completing The Island

This part of the island is complete when the final puzzle is solved and the laser fires into the sky. Nice work!

Written Response

To received full points for this lab, write a ~1-2 page reflection on what you learned from completing this part of the island. Feel free to use the prompts in blue as a starting point for this response.

Secret Puzzles

Where might this hidden path lead us?
